knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyr)
library(zoo)
```

```{r}
load("Factor_data.RData")
Factor_data <- as.data.table(Factor_data)
```

```{r}
panel_a <- Factor_data[!is.na(Beta_3) & !is.infinite(Beta_3) & !is.na(`B/M`) & !is.infinite(`B/M`) & !is.na(Log_MV) & !is.infinite(Log_MV),
                                            .(gamma_zero=lm(RET.USD~Beta_3+`B/M`+Log_MV)$coefficient[1],
                                              gamma_beta=lm(RET.USD~Beta_3+`B/M`+Log_MV)$coefficient[2],
                                              gamma_bm=lm(RET.USD~Beta_3+`B/M`+Log_MV)$coefficient[3],
                                              gamma_mv=lm(RET.USD~Beta_3+`B/M`+Log_MV)$coefficient[4],
                                              no.obs=length(Id)),by=ym]


panel_a[,t.test(gamma_zero)]
panel_a[,t.test(gamma_beta)]
panel_a[,t.test(gamma_bm)]
panel_a[,t.test(gamma_mv)]
```
